values.name: 3Phase Events
values.description:
Live events production company specialising in producing and promoting theatre and music shows, and providing lighting design, sound design and technical support. 

Currently producing shows for The Brighton Fringe in 2013, plus related preview shows.

www.facebook.com/3PhaseEvents

O’Neal Flat Rolled Metals is a leading supplier of stainless, aluminum, and carbon flat rolled products. With headquarters in Brighton, CO, OFR Metals has 15 locations nationwide that serve customers in diverse markets including food service, transportation, HVAC, sheet metal fabrication, construction, automotive and many others. 

O’Neal Flat Rolled Metals is one of more than a dozen companies that comprise O'Neal Industries, the U.S.'s largest family-owned group of metals service centers. O'Neal Industries is based in Birmingham, Alabama, and has more than 90 specialized facilities throughout North America, South America, Europe, and Asia.

To find a location near year, please visit our website!
values.name: O'Neal Flat Rolled Metals
Added Bytes
values.description:
Based in Brighton and Hove, UK, Added Bytes are specialists in web development, as happy planning and building you a system from the ground up as adding a module to one of the Open Source platforms we work with every day. 

We take care of all parts of the website building process, including planning and wireframes, branding and design, development, marketing, testing, deployment, hosting and website management.

We have buckets of experience with the major open source e-commerce and CMS platforms, including Magento, MODX, Drupal, OpenCart, Prestashop and Wordpress, and including installation, themeing, custom module development, hosting and even platform upgrades.  

Get in touch to find out more!

With over 10 years experience we are one of Brighton's favourite decorating companies.  

We have a medium sized team of dedicated professionals who are trained to ensure that our customers are kept happy at all times.  To ensure this we first and foremost select people who our customers are happy to have in their houses or workplaces.  Then we make sure that everyone who works for us is a qualified decorator who is committed to the profession.  

We are happy to come and have a look at any work you might have for us.  We have extensive experience of both commercial and residential projects.  

Please call us now.
values.name: Mike Moody Decorating

values.description:
Yesco Electrical Supply Inc. is a locally owned and operated company that was established in 1987. Lee DeRose opened his first location in a small building on Marshall Street in Youngstown, Ohio. He used the experience he gained from working as an electrician at the General Motors Lordstown Assembly Plant and applied it to an entirely different aspect of the business - representing manufacturers of electrical supplies. Yesco serves customers in a variety of segments, from Industrial, Institutional, Residential and Contractors to Security, Alarm and Computer industries.

In 1990, Yesco moved to its current location on Marshall Street to an expanded storage facility allowing additional product to be kept in stock. Yesco currently stocks and resells 165,000 products from over 400 manufacturers. This growth was just the beginning as we have grown by an additional four locations since that time. Yesco opened its Columbiana, Ohio location in 1996, purchased the assets of the wholesale division of Bruce and Merrilee Electric Co in New Castle, Pennsylvania in 2004, and acquired the assets of Elliott Electric Supply Co and lighting showroom located in New Brighton, Pennsylvania in 2005.

Today, Yesco has grown to 60 employees, maintaining over 50,000 square feet of location space, serving over 6000 customers while stocking and re-selling 165,000 products from over 400 manufacturers. Yesco's territory covers a 12 county region in Western Pennsylvania and Eastern Ohio.
values.name: YESCO Electrical Supply

values.description: Stafford House is a member of the Cambridge Education Group and has been successfully running EFL programmes for more than 60 years. Stafford House School of English is a year round school offering a range of English Language programmes to adult and junior students in London, Brighton and Canterbury.
values.name: Stafford House School of English

values.description:
The Entertainment Guide is the best source for all that's happening across the United Kingdom. We have scoured the country to bring you the latest British and International cuisine, music venues, accomodation and days out from Aberdeenshire to Brighton.

Our printed guides divide The United Kingdom into numerous areas (Aberdeen, Tayside, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Stirling and Falkirk, Ayrshire, Perth, Lanarkshire and Manchester), making it easy to plan your trip if you're a first-time visitor or have a change of scene if you're a local. You can find our printed guides in outlets nationwide; of course, the Entertainment Guide website brings all these are...as together, giving you literally hundreds of restaurants, bars, nightclubs and hotels to choose from.

While we update our website on on a regular basis, we accept no responsibility for incorrect information regarding prices, services or amenities held on the Entertainment Guide. We provide contact details where possible and strongly recommend ensuring businesses meet with your requirements prior to your visit.
values.name: The Entertainment Guide
Bournemouth Symphony Orchestra
values.description:
The BSO is one of the UK's top symphony orchestras with an illustrious history spanning over 120 years. Serving the South and South-West, we give over 130 concerts a year in Poole, Bournemouth, Bristol, Exeter, Portsmouth, Basingstoke, Brighton, Cheltenham and many other venues throughout the world.

We have appeared on over 350 recordings so far with an incredible array of artists including current Principal Conductor Kirill Karabits, Paavo Berglund, Marin Alsop, Sir Simon Rattle, Sir Dan Godfrey, Constantin Silvestri and many others.

Who are we? 

Talbot Fashions LLP was established in 1980 by twin brothers Anthony and Robert Talbot, and the company has grown to become one of the UK’s leading suppliers of fashion accessories to the trade.

We operate from a modern warehousing facility which is based on the South Coast in the happening seaside city of Brighton and Hove, from where we despatch our products throughout the UK, Europe and the rest of the world. All orders are despatched from our large stocks and usually reach their destination within 1-2 working days of receiving the order. (UK)

If you would like to visit our warehouse, then please call us in advance to arrange on 01273 776415. Parking is available. 
  
What do we do? 

We specialise in the sourcing and wholesaling of fashion jewellery and accessories for all age groups and both sexes. We currently hold almost 1000 different product lines, which are customised, packaged and bar-coded.

We supply independent fashion retailers, gift shops, multiple chain stores, party planners, wholesalers, online sellers, market traders and others.

Our team of nationwide sales representatives are able to present and give advice on our entire range, including any new additions that might otherwise not be viewed until the next catalogue.

We produce 2 colour catalogues a year, laid out in an easy to order format.

All orders are processed and despatched usually within 1 working day of receipt of your order.
values.name: Talbot Fashions
Web Cycle
values.description:
Web Design company based in Brighton who have a down to earth attitude, cutting edge designs, professional etiquette & friendly staff without the inflated price tag!

We believe in a more client friendly, jargon free web design company who will make sure you get exactly what you want and need to move your business or hobby forward in the right direction.

Apartments of London is offering short term and holiday lets market with quality apartments right in the heart of London, for corporate or leisure purposes.

Finding suitable accommodation in the centre of London can be tricky and you could find yourself limited to large, impersonal hotel chains. We pride ourselves on offering visitors high quality, opulent apartments which look out onto many of London's top landmarks such as the Houses of Parliament, London Eye, Tower of London, Hyde Park and more

Our properties are conveniently located in London's Victoria district, from where you can get a direct train to and from Gatwick and Heathrow Airports. Victoria Train Station has regular services to Brighton and the underground will take you anywhere within London, although with most major London attractions right on your doorstep you won't have to travel far to see the sights.

Apartments are self-catering and fully equipped with all mod cons including Wi-Fi, digital TV, washing machine, dishwashers and fully fitted modern kitchens. Whether it's a business trip or a city break, you can relax in comfort and style without the fear of any interruptions, and knowing that you can come and go as you please.

Apartments of London are also happy to provide you with a brief guide of the major London attractions, including some local knowledge that will you find invaluable during your stay.
values.name: Apartments of London

values.description:
Image Plan Surveys specialise in stunning professional photography, accurate scaled floorplans and Energy Performance Certificates for the property industry.

Working closely with estate agents, developers, solicitors and individual clients in order to offer a bespoke professional property marketing service.

In addition to this we offer further services which include surveying, conveyancing, financial services, gas safety certificates, inventories, building and design services, based in Brighton but covering Sussex and areas up to Central London.
values.name: Image Plan Surveys

values.description:
Stonehurst Estates is an independent development and investment company with more than 40 years' experience in residential and commercial property projects.
 
The privately owned company has an enviable track record of restoring historic buildings and creating innovative new-build projects on prestigious sites throughout the UK and abroad, valued at more than £100 million.
 
Its diverse and imaginative development programme includes high-profile projects in London, Barbados, Manchester, Dover and Sussex worth in excess of £75 million, working with renowned international architects and designers.
 
Recent projects include:
 •The Light ApartHotel, Manchester's first Boutique ApartHotel
 •The transformation of the historic Greenwich Promenade
 •A major regeneration of Dover town centre as the preferred partner of Dover District Council
 •The conversion of a 250-year-old Barbados plantation house into a private home with pool, in two acres of grounds
 •The redevelopment of Temple Grove, a 30-acre estate in East Sussex, into fourteen luxury apartments and office suites
 •The refurbishment and completion of St George's Mill, Leicester to provide 22 new penthouse apartments, within an existing residential mill building (92 flats). The spacious 2 and 3 bedroom penthouses and two retail/restaurant units will be available for sale or rent
 •The Light ApartHotel, Brighton
values.name: Stonehurst Estates
Dumpster Design
values.description:
Dumpster Design specialises in the design and creation of bespoke couture pieces, made entirely from recycled materials. Producing one off commissions for special occasions, and branded dresses for PR campaigns. Dumpster Design has been featured in Vogue, Marie Clare magazine and been named as 'the one to watch' in the international Radical Designer Awards, held in Monte Carlo.

Company collaborations include: 
-Benefit Cosmetics
-Suzuki
-The Royal Navy
-Waitrose
-Brighton Fashion Week
-Veolia
-Delicious Magazine
-Goodwood motor circuit

From modest and humble beginnings in early 2000, Riviera Health has grown steadily to its present configuration of 313 aged care places, spread across the wider Sydney basin. 

Comprising five unique, boutique-style aged care residences, all now individually restored to ensure they complement their own particular localities. Riviera is  justifiably proud of its reputation for the provision of high quality care in a carefully tailored living environment.

As a long-term, family-owned organisation, Riviera is currently planning a new flagship residence in Western Sydney, together with a long awaited refurbishment  of its existing Brighton-Le-Sands residence. 

Riviera has long believed in the importance of a highly skilled and caring staff, as the basis of ensuring high quality residential care is provided to the elderly.  Importantly, the Riviera Board and Best Practice Committee’s are charged with ensuring this focus is both nurtured and sustained over the longer term.
values.name: Riviera Health Group
Rockstone Bike Alley
values.description:
Rock Stone Bike Alley was established seven years ago by Rockford Copeland and is a workshop in Tottenham.  Individuals can come and learn how to fix, repair bikes, as well as bike maintenance.  Also it runs a social inclusion activity that called the ‘postcode rides’ where young people from different postcode areas and estates, will ride in groups from one rival postcode area to another.  Under supervision these young people will engage and meet others from these other neighbourhoods’ and they eventually progress to go out and ride with each other on trips further afield to go to other estates and areas.  Every summer Rock Stone Bike Alley, assembles these young people for the annual London to Brighton Bike ride.  Another aspect of the project is to train young cyclists to become competitive bike riders for various competitions.  Many young people have gone on to cycle in 10 km cycle rides and ride for charity and compete in amateur rides throughout the UK.

Our workshop carries out repairs and maintenance work sells bikes accessories, brand new and 2nd hand bikes customise bikes to your specifications.  We offer cycling instruction, coach education and training, deliver fitness training, provide sports science support & injury management, and nutritional advice, for cycling and other sports. We also offer GP refferals, and mental health support/workshops.

values.name: Stadimax

values.description:
Peter Christian is a family owned business based in the hamlet of Small Dole tucked away in the South Downs about 10 miles from Brighton. Classic, well tailored gentleman’s clothing is getting harder and more expensive to find these days but Peter Christian is widely acknowledged as the first choice online gentleman’s outfitter.

As with the outfitters of old; personal service, sensible advice and courtesy are all included in the shopping experience. Peter Christian aim to provide classic British clothing with a distinctive style and quality of tailoring to add a smart touch to your wardrobe.
values.name: Peter Christian
